page.title: Data Backups
page.description: Create and restore snapshots of your financial data

create.title: Create New Backup
create.description: Select a module and create a backup of all its data
create.label: Module to Backup

list.title: Your Backups
list.description: View and restore your backed up data
list.empty: No backups yet. Create your first backup above.

info.title: Important Information
info.point1: Backups create a snapshot of all data in the selected module at the time of creation
info.point2: Restoring a backup will DELETE all current data and REPLACE it with the backed up data
info.point3: Each backup stores the complete state of your data, including all fields and settings
info.point4: Backups are exclusive to Wealth tier subscribers
info.point5: You can create multiple backups for the same module to track changes over time

restore.title: Restore Backup?
restore.description: This will REPLACE all your current {module} data with the backed up data. All existing items will be deleted and replaced. This action cannot be undone.

delete.title: Delete Backup?
delete.description: This will permanently delete this backup. This action cannot be undone.

messages.restoreSuccessDescription: Restored {count} item(s). All existing items were replaced.
